heading: Diablo 4 Maintenance Scheduled for June 26th & 27th â€“ is this the Big Patch?
content: From 9:00AM - 2:00PM PDT June 26th & 9:30AM - 2:00PM PDT June 27th, as it undergoes scheduled maintenance. As Teased earlier this week the developer team has been working on a massive 13+ page patch for the game, we can only expect this will be delivered over the next couple days! We're still waiting for any sort of patch notes to go along with what may be coming the next couples days, stay tuned with our so you don't miss out on any updates!
